channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 13:37 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 13:37 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Watch for further messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 13:37 Driven the alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya territorial community. Salt for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 13:37 Driven the alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya territorial community. Salt for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 13:31 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 13:31 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region.
